metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0284 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper Input Validation of LDAP user IDs in Tribe29 Checkmk allows attackers that can control LDAP user IDs to manipulate files on the server. Checkmk <= 2.1.0p19, Checkmk <= 2.0.0p32, and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0 (EOL) are affected.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
